verses.roman:
pitā-mātā-guru-sakhā-bhāva kene naya
kṛṣṇa-premera svabhāve dāsya-bhāva se karaya

synonyms: pitā—father; mātā—mother; guru—superior teacher; sakhā—friend; bhāva—the emotion; kene naya—let it be; kṛṣṇa-premera—of love of Kṛṣṇa; svabhāve—in a natural inclination; dāsya bhāva—the emotion of becoming a servant; se—that; karaya—does.
translation: All the emotions, whether those of father, mother, teacher or friend, are full of sentiments of servitude. That is the nature of love of Kṛṣṇa.
